title: Best of Comedy Gold Minds: Marlon Wayans
description:
We're celebrating some of the best interviews from Comedy Gold Minds this week, featuring Kevin Hart’s discussion with actor and comedian Marlon Wayans. The two sit down to talk about how Marlon has worked in the industry for over 30 years, how the Scary Movie franchise was taken from him, how his brothers inspire him, and how his quarantine beard finally shaped up.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Marlon Wayans)
